release_notes:
# Twitter Scraper v1.1.0

## 🔄 Auto-Update System
- Automatic updates from GitHub Releases
- Preserve user settings during updates
- Automatic notifications for new versions

## 📦 Core Features
- High-quality Twitter/X data extraction
- Advanced terminal interface with Rich library
- Intelligent rate limiting system
- Export to CSV and JSON formats
- Persistent authentication system
- Multi-threaded data processing

## 🛠️ Installation & Setup
1. Download the Twitter-Scraper.zip file
2. Extract the archive
3. Run the Run.py script
4. Enter your Twitter credentials
5. Start extracting data

## 📋 Requirements
- Python 3.11+
- Chrome/Chromium browser
- Internet connection
- Valid Twitter account

## 🚀 Key Improvements
- Enhanced performance and stability
- Improved user interface
- Better error handling
- Optimized data processing

## 🔧 Technologies Used
- Selenium WebDriver
- Rich Terminal UI
- Pandas Data Processing
- GitHub API Integration
